A small but enjoyable experience with an incredibly creative gameplay mechanic and fantastic level design, with some juicy lore and story to boot! Takes only a few hours to complete, so if you like short games that test your brain this game might be right up your alley. Highly recommend playing this game before Portal 2 for context on that game's story.
Great game. try the 2nd one too
